General.Name: GeneDx Holdings Corp.
General.Description: GeneDx Holdings Corp., a genomics company, provides genetic testing services. It primarily offers pediatric and rare disease diagnostics with a focus on whole exome and genome sequencing, as well as data and information services. The company also develops an AI-based platform for NGS analysis, interpretation, and clinical reporting for rare disease, hereditary risk, and cancer testing. The company is headquartered in Stamford, Connecticut.
General.Address: North Tower, Stamford, CT, United States, 06902
